attributes.action: Investigate why so many fit footballers are collapsing in recent months
attributes.additional_details: Because this is not normal and it’s becoming a weekly thing that players have collapsed
attributes.background: There has been a lot of footballers collapsing either during a game or at training ground, what is the sudden cause of this?

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The health and safety of football players is a matter for their managers and coaches, not the Government or Parliament.
